answers.answer: The right doctor would be a urologist.I worked for one.  I don't know of any that work for free.  Most ED is caused by nerve damage or vascular problems or diabetes, which can cause both of the first problems and more.One supplement that often works for vascular problems is L-arginine.Don't smoke.  Fish oil may be useful.  Get checked for diabetes.  Exercise.
